name: Report Page
blurb:
This past year, [our team](/team) researched how media literacy practitioners understand and prioritize equity in their media literacy educational practice. In addition, we are interested in what impact means as a process and an aspirational goal for media literacy interventions.

Based on rigorous research with practitioners from around the United States, we have created a Field Guide for Equitable Media Literacy Practice that is accessible and available to the public. 

The full report, **Equity and Impact in Media Literacy Practice: Mapping the Field in the United States**, will be release during [2021 US Media Literacy Week](https://medialiteracyweek.us/) (October 25 - 30). The full report will be available here on October 25th.
